channel.title: Posts on Excavating Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Excavating Mind

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello all, I hope you are doing well. This brief introductory post will outline what I want to achieve with my blogging website. I will outline these here. To aid creating a professional web presence to demonstrate my skills as a hopeful psychology PhD candidate and subsequent postdoc researcher / lecturer. To provide accessible and reproducible open psychology and data science content. To support undergraduate and postgraduate psychology students by providing them with content that enhances their skills.
